data.name: CrudStoreBase_AddAsync
data.value: {0} failed to add a new {1}! parameter: {2}. See inner exception(s) for more detail.

data.name: CrudStoreBase_DeleteAsync
data.value: {0} failed to delete a {1}! parameter: {2}. See inner exception(s) for more detail.

data.name: CrudStoreBase_UpdateAsync
data.value: {0} failed to update a {1}! parameter: {2}. See inner exception(s) for more detail.

data.name: KeyUtility_KeyType
data.value: The KeyUtility doesn't know how to deal with a key of type: '{0}'.

data.name: LinqRepositoryOptions_CS
data.value: LinqRepository options require a 'ConnectionString' field and it appears to be missing, or empty.

data.name: LoaderOptions_Strategy
data.value: Loader strategy options require a 'Strategy' field and it appears to be missing, or empty.

data.name: RepositoryOptions_Strategy
data.value: Repository options require a 'Strategy' field and it appears to be missing, or empty. Check the configuration to ensure that it contains a 'Strategy' field under the 'Repositories' section. Also, ensure that you're binding to the properties above the 'Repositories' section, so that the binding operation won't fail and the options will validate properly.

data.name: ServiceCollectionExtensions_EmptyStrategyName
data.value: Despite our best efforts, you've somehow managed to call the '{0}' method with an empty strategy name! Please correct the strategy name in the associated options and try again.

data.name: ServiceCollectionExtensions_MethodNotFound
data.value: Failed to locate an extension method named: '{0}' accepting IServiceCollection and IConfiguration arguments. Do you have the corresponding assembly loaded, or specified for loading in the configuration? Also, is the strategy name correct?

data.name: ServiceCollectionExtensions_MethodNotFound2
data.value: Failed to locate an extension method named: '{0}' accepting {1} and IConfiguration arguments. Do you have the corresponding assembly loaded, or specified for loading in the configuration? Also, is the strategy name correct?

data.name: ServiceCollectionExtensions_NoLoadAssembly
data.value: Unable to load the specified assembly: '{0}'. If this is a path to an assembly, is it correct? If this is an assembly name, is the corresponding dll file in your path? See inner exception(s) for more detail.

data.name: StrategyOptions_Strategy
data.value: Strategy options require a 'Strategy' field and it appears to be missing, or empty. Check the configuration to ensure that it contains a 'Strategy' field under the 'Strategies' section. Also, ensure that you're binding to the properties above the 'Strategies' section, so that the binding operation won't fail and the options will validate properly.
